reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: VN/Management Information System for Forestry Sector Phase II

description.narrative: The overall objective of the Management Information System for Forestry project phase II (FORMIS II) is to contribute to the socio-economic development of Viet Nam by reinforcing the sustainable forest resources management and the alleviation of poverty. t he purpose of the project is to strengthen the implementation of strategies of the forestry sector by providing adequate and accurate information for decision making at all administrative levels. The FORMIS II is designed to take 5 years (2013-2018). Finla nd's funding for the project is 9.7 MEUR and Vietnam's contribution is 437 530 euros. This additional funding has been added to correct an error in accounting and does not increase Finland's contribution from 9.7 million euros.
